0.2.0.name: wordpress/contact-form-7-backuprestore
0.2.0.description:
This is a simple WordPress plugin that will allow you to backup and restore your WordPress Contact Form 7 data / configuration.

It will also enable you can transfer your configuration from one site to another to save time re-typing those configurations.

Works with: Contact Form 7 version 1.xx

Note: For more information, visit the Contact Form Backup plugin page at Code Stuff
